author: Special Correspondent
text:
A total of 40 persons, including women, were selected for the Salem City Home Guards unit during the selection camp held at the Armed Reserve ground here recently. The City Home Guards unit sought applications from eligible candidates for joining the unit. A total 184 applications were received from men and women. The physical fitness test was held at the Armed Reserve ground in the presence of Sumit Saran, City Police Commissioner. A total of 40 persons, who were found fit, were selected. Another 20 persons selected were kept on waiting list.

The training for the selected home guards will commence in the first week of February.
title: Selection of Home Guards
